amendment.description: Amendment requires that there be a written public record of any contacts between agency persons and persons outside of an agency relating to a major rule during the rulemaking process.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require that there be a written public record of all agency contacts made by persons outside an agency relating to a major rule during the rulemaking process.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A014) Agreed to by recorded vote: 406 - 23 (Roll no. 186).
